section.title: Intelligent dictionaries
section.p: The goal is to make a dictionary that gives morphological equivalents of the entries. Thus, in addition to offer 'boahtit' for 'komme (to come)' (and vice versa), it should also offer 'boađán' for 'jeg kommer (I come)' (and vice versa).
At the moment, we are working on morphology-aware electronic dictionaries. The user may click any inflected word in a text, and get the translation of the corresponding lemma.
